title: GroupManager问题
author: Worthykazoo
txt_content: 每当玩家重新进入服务器后，聊天框会显示you were moved to the group Default in all_unnamed_worlds 或者 world. 显示你的权限组被移动到了default组，而default组不可以使用money 那些普通指令，用/manuadd 玩家名 player all 重新进入服务器后还是这样，怎么办，想要固定玩家组都是player

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 skyliye 于 2019-6-14 22:43 编辑 

修改Permissionstime插件中的配置文件：
# 默认权限组.
# Default permission group.
defaultGroup: Default

default改成player
不过你如果手动将玩家移到其他组还是会变回来，比如给了vip马上掉
建议参考插件发布贴来分配权限http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-707273-1-1.html

replies.author: 世予予
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: Worthykazoo
replies.txt_content:
世予 发表于 2019-6-14 22:31
打开这个路径 打开Groups.yml
把Builder组的default改成true
然后把default组的default改成false
我把builder组的名字改成了player,然后继承组名称也改成了player....需要改回去吗

replies.author: Worthykazoo
replies.txt_content:
世予 发表于 2019-6-14 22:31
打开这个路径 打开Groups.yml
把Builder组的default改成true
然后把default组的default改成false
本来就是default了依然这样的

replies.author: 世予予
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: Worthykazoo
replies.txt_content:
世予 发表于 2019-6-14 22:31
打开这个路径 打开Groups.yml
把Builder组的default改成true
然后把default组的default改成false
# Group inheritance
#
# Any inherited groups prefixed with a g: are global groups
# and are inherited from the GlobalGroups.yml.
#
# Groups without the g: prefix are groups local to this world
# and are defined in the this groups.yml file.
#
# Local group inheritances define your promotion tree when using 'manpromote/mandemote'

groups:
  OP:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - moderator
    - g:groupmanager_admin
    - g:bukkit_admin
    - g:essentials_admin
    - g:towny_admin
    - g:vanish_admin
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&c'
      suffix: ''
  Moderator:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - player
    - g:groupmanager_moderator
    - g:bukkit_moderator
    - g:essentials_moderator
    - g:towny_moderator
    - g:vanish_moderator
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&5'
      suffix: ''
  Owner:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - +vanish.effects.toggle.all
    - -vanish.effects.*
    - '*'
    inheritance:
    - op
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&4'
      suffix: ''
  Player:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - chestcommands.open.example.yml
    - essentials.kits.tools
    - essentials.kits.xslb
    - essentials.command.tps
    - multiverse.other.w
    - multiverse.self.*
    - multiverse.self.w
    inheritance:
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&2'
      suffix: ''
  Default:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -bukkit.command.kill
    inheritance:
    - g:groupmanager_default
    - g:bukkit_default
    - g:essentials_default
    - g:towny_default
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: '&e'
      suffix: ''

配置文件
